Package jetbrains.exodus.bindings

Class IntegerBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • jetbrains.exodus.bindings.ComparableBinding
      • jetbrains.exodus.bindings.IntegerBinding
  • public class IntegerBinding
extends ComparableBinding
    ComparableBinding for Integer values. In addition to typical intToEntry(int) and entryToInt(ByteIterable) methods operating with ByteIterables of length 4, IntegerBinding has a pair of methods for serialization/deserialization of non-negative values to/from compressed entries: intToCompressedEntry(int) and compressedEntryToInt(ByteIterable). The lower the value, the shorter the compressed entry. In some cases, compressed entries let you significantly decrease database size. Serialization of non-negative integers and longs to compressed entries also saves the order of values.
    See Also:
    ComparableBinding

      • compressedEntryToSignedInt

        public static int compressedEntryToSignedInt​(@NotNull
                                             @NotNull ByteIterable entry)
        De-serializes compressed ByteIterable entry to a signed int value. The entry should be an output of signedIntToCompressedEntry(int).

        ZigZag encoding is used, so it doesn't save the order of values like other ComparableBindings do.

        Parameters:
        entry - ByteIterable instance
        Returns:
        de-serialized value
        See Also:
        entryToInt(ByteIterable), intToEntry(int), compressedEntryToInt(ByteIterable), intToCompressedEntry(int), signedIntToCompressedEntry(int)

      • signedIntToCompressedEntry

        public static ArrayByteIterable signedIntToCompressedEntry​(int object)
        Serializes signed int value in the range [Integer.MIN_VALUE/2..Integer.MAX_VALUE/2] to the compressed ArrayByteIterable entry.

        ZigZag encoding is used, so it doesn't save the order of values like other ComparableBindings do.

        Parameters:
        object - value to serialize in the range [Integer.MIN_VALUE/2..Integer.MAX_VALUE/2]
        Returns:
        ArrayByteIterable entry
        See Also:
        entryToInt(ByteIterable), intToEntry(int), compressedEntryToInt(ByteIterable), intToCompressedEntry(int), compressedEntryToSignedInt(ByteIterable)
